Description: Papyrus written with black ink with demotic legal text: 6 ll. on recto and list of 16 witnesses on verso. Thompson's MS Catalogue: "Contract of lease for 99 years of the office of choachyte in a certain tomb granted by Pame son of Petubast to Panofer son of Snachomneus. Scribe Psenamun son of Panas. Date. year 20 Thoth of Ptol. Euergetes I. = BC. 228 Oct-Nov."
Bibliographic references: Reich 1914 / Papyri juistischen Inhalts in hieratischer und demotischer Schrift aus dem British Museum (p.56-9, pl.12-3)
Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (2725) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/2725)
Condition: Papyrus Survey: Condition Details: Papyrus: fractured Black ink Backed: brown paper Unsupported locally Mount Details: Sandwich: glass Sandwich: board Binding: cloth Window verso Object Priority: B Mount Priority: A Overall Condition: B Curatorial condition comment: fair
